Ever clicked through a product, only to feel the frustration of something just... not working?

A slow-loading page, a misaligned button, or that dreaded bug that ruins a seamless experience. You've seen it, felt it, and probably walked away. But what if all those issues could be caught before they even reach the user?

Here's the truth: Quality assurance isn't just about fixing errors—it's about ensuring every feature, every line of code, works flawlessly together. It’s about creating a user experience where trust and reliability are the foundation.

That's where I come in...

I turn complex software into seamless, bug-free experiences—one test at a time.

An independent manual testing case study on Jumia’s e-commerce platform, covering critical user flows like product search, cart updates, checkout, and payment validation — with detailed test cases and well-documented defect reports.
